Thanx, Yanshosh.I knew my bickering would go somewhere some day.


* Iron Raptor growled as she heard the transmission from Tavatron, the news 
no better then she had expected�it was a lot worse.
Dinobot had collapsed in the hall leading to the CR room and had bled all of 
his mech fluid from his body, presumably now in stasis lock.
She opened her com-link back to Tavatron. *

� I�ll be right there!�

* This wasn�t good, not good at all.
Yes, Tavatron and Dinobot had returned to base, but it seemed that Tavatron 
was in better shape then her traveling partner.
And for all she knew, Dinobot could be dead already.
Slight panic rising in her spark, the death of a teammate never being any 
good.
Iron Raptor was just about to dash for the door when a pair of familiar arms 
slid around her, causing her to nearly jump.
She looked up and to the side to find herself looking into Prowls eyes, glad 
to see that he was up and about, but the seriousness of the current 
situation left no room for a smile.
Iron Raptor looked towards the door and actually removed Prowls arms from 
herself, taking quick steps towards the doors to the CR room.
She didn�t even look back at him. *

� No time for pleasantries. Dinobot�s down and completely devoid of 
mech-fluid in the hall. Stasis lock. I could use your help.�

* And with that, she exited the room, knowing that they would have to check 
him out before they placed him into a CR chamber, thankful for the repair 
station Feline had made up in the CR room.
She entered into the hall and turned the corner, Tavatron coming into view, 
then seeing the downed Dinobot at her feet.
There was no time to wait for Prowl as she quickly ran up behind Tavatron 
and looked down at the damaged bot, her systems scanning over him and 
determining what was wrong.
Iron Raptor squatted down and look a closer look over Dinobot, not even 
taking notice of the puddle of his mech-fluid she happened to be standing 
in.*

� He�s stopped breathing, and there�s no more mech-fluid left in his body. 
If we don�t get his fluid limit back up and air into his lungs, he�ll die. 
And by the looks of it, we have about 12 min to do it.�

* With that she simply, but quickly, took one of Dinobots� arms and slung it 
over her shoulder, putting an arm around his back and then standing up�the 
best she could.
He was heavy!
Iron Raptor gritted her teeth as she struggled to keep her balance, 
wondering that if she took a step that the weight of this bot would bring 
her down with it.
However, she would have to find out sooner or later, the need to get him to 
the CR room dominant over all.
She took a step towards Tavatron and the CR room but the weight of Dinobot 
was almost too much for her to take alone, wondering just how a bot could 
look so lien and be so heavy at the same time.
She growled with the effort it took just to keep him from falling, must be 
muscle. *
